revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{der|en|enm|yespon}}, {{m|enm|ȝespon}}, {{m|enm|ȝespen}}, {{m|enm|ȝispon||a measure of volume equivalent to that contained in a person’s hands cupped together}}. ''See'' {{m|en|yepsen}} for more. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|?}} # {{lb|en|obsolete|Essex}} Anything that can be [[hold#Verb|held]] in [[two]] [[hand#Noun|hands]]; a [[double#Adjective|double]] [[handful]]. ====References==== * {{R:Bailey Dictionary|entry=A YEEPSEN|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=DtbzjHUHvAwC&pg=PP964|column=2}}
